title: Handle Low Stock Alert
description: An automated alert indicates that a popular product is about to run out of stock. The agent needs to take action.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the low-stock alert and identify the product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the product SKU and current stock level.

tasks.description: Check if there are any pending purchase orders for this product from suppliers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a purchase order is scheduled to arrive in 5 days.

tasks.description: Update the product page to display a 'More stock arriving soon' message to manage customer expectations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the product page messaging.
